events.body: The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers. ### Reviews See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process. | Type | Reviewers | | ---- | --------- | | ACK | [hebasto](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34450#pullrequestreview-3727714046) | If your review is incorrectly listed, please copy-paste <!--meta-tag:bot-skip--> into the comment that the bot should ignore.
ACK 76d6fa9beb4f0d68cd02c5c26a28f67ebf7bf6cb, I have reviewed the code and it looks OK.
Should add #34370 to the release notes, although I'd give it a more descriptive title, maybe "wallet: Additional cleanups for migration, and fixes for createfromdump with BDB"

events.body:
Updated 76d6fa9beb4f0d68cd02c5c26a28f67ebf7bf6cb -> 2b2c4daa5357d4d6abefe2c87eb74caf12c09342 ([29.3rc2-finalize_0](https://github.com/sedited/bitcoin/tree/29.3rc2-finalize_0) -> [29.3rc2-finalize_1](https://github.com/sedited/bitcoin/tree/29.3rc2-finalize_1), [compare](https://github.com/sedited/bitcoin/compare/29.3rc2-finalize_0..29.3rc2-finalize_1))

* Took @achow101's [suggestion](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34450#issuecomment-3819419768) for adding to the release notes.

comments.body: `1` is the section number, see `man man-pages`

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 .\" DO NOT MODIFY THIS FILE!  It was generated by help2man 1.49.3.
-.TH BITCOIN-CLI "1" "January 2026" "bitcoin-cli v29.3.0rc1" "User Commands"
+.TH BITCOIN-CLI "1" "January 2026" "bitcoin-cli v29.3.0rc2" "User Commands"
comments.body: The 1 isn't a date, it's the section number of the manpage.
